#summary How to get and use the source code
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

`get-flash-videos` is developed in git, on
[http://github.com/monsieurvideo/get-flash-videos GitHub].

You may check out a copy of the source using:
{{
   git clone git://github.com/monsieurvideo/get-flash-videos.git
}}

Alternatively you can [http://github.com/monsieurvideo/get-flash-videos fork]
the project on GitHub in order to contribute patches that way.

Read [[Developing]] for details on how to add support for sites.
